select.selectitems: any_number_value any_string_value area_measure count_measure length_measure plane_angle_measure ratio_measure volume_measure

where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY ( msb <* QUERY ( it <* SELF.items | ('AP243_BOUNDARY_REPRESENTATION_FOR_ISO_14306_OPEN_JT_ARM_LF.MANIFOLD_SOLID_BREP' IN TYPEOF(it)) ) | ( NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( csh <* collect_shells(msb) | (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( fcs <* csh\ connected_face_set.connected_faces | (NOT ( 'AP243_BOUNDARY_REPRESENTATION_FOR_ISO_14306_OPEN_JT_ARM_LF.ADVANCED_FACE' IN TYPEOF(fcs))) )) = 0)) )) = 0)) )) = 0
where.label: WR1

entity.name: Detailed_geometric_model_element
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Direction, Axis_placement, Cartesian_transformation_2d, Cartesian_transformation_3d, Geometric_placement_operation) ANDOR ONEOF (Direction, Axis_placement, Cartesian_transformation_2d, Cartesian_transformation_3d, Curve, Surface) ANDOR ONEOF (Clipping_operator, Model_image_3d, Light_source, Camera_model_d3) ANDOR ONEOF (Hatch_style, Tile_style) ANDOR ONEOF (Direction, Axis_placement, Cartesian_transformation_2d, Cartesian_transformation_3d, Curve, Geometric_model_element_relationship, Surface, Vector)

entity.name: Detailed_topological_model_element
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Connected_edge_set, Connected_face_set, Edge, Face, Face_bound, Vertex, (Loop ANDOR Path))

where.expression: (NOT EXISTS(voids)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY ( ocs <* SELF.voids | ( NOT (ocs.orientation = FALSE)))) = 0)
where.label: WR1

entity.name: Surface
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Conical_surface, Cylindrical_surface, Plane, Spherical_surface, Swept_surface, Toroidal_surface)

entity.name: Unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Amount_of_substance_unit, Electric_current_unit, Length_unit, Luminous_intensity_unit, Mass_unit, Plane_angle_unit, Ratio_unit, Solid_angle_unit, Thermodynamic_temperature_unit, Time_unit)

entity.name: Value_with_unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Acceleration_data_element, Absorbed_dose_data_element, Radioactivity_data_element, Amount_of_substance_data_element, Angle_data_element, Area_data_element, Capacitance_data_element, Celsius_temperature_data_element, Conductance_data_element, Dielectric_constant_data_element, Dose_equivalent_data_element, Electric_charge_data_element, Electric_current_data_element, Electric_potential_data_element, Energy_data_element, Force_data_element, Frequency_data_element, Illuminance_data_element, Inductance_data_element, Length_data_element, Loss_tangent_data_element, Luminous_flux_data_element, Luminous_intensity_data_element, Magnetic_flux_data_element, Magnetic_flux_density_data_element, Mass_data_element, Power_data_element, Pressure_data_element, Ratio_data_element, Resistance_data_element, Solid_angle_data_element, Thermal_resistance_data_element, Thermodynamic_temperature_data_element, Velocity_data_element, Volume_data_element)

function.name: acyclic_representation_relationship
bag_to_set
boolean_choice
collect_shells
path_aligned
positive_curve_weights
positive_surface_weights
spa_get_definition
